Hello:

I am having trouble getting the ck2cti utility to work. I seem to b=
e
running into two problems.

1) When I run with all three input files, the=
 program seems to run
fine, the log file says that the program has been suc=
cessful and I can
see that it has processed the reactions and the thermodyn=
amic data,
but I get no output. The program just sits there and does not re=
turn
the output data or the command prompt. 

2) The mechanism that I am mo=
st interested in using does not have 
transport data (I don't need it). The=
 program seems to crash when the
transport file is not included. If I check=
 the log file it appears
that everything up through the thermo data and the=
 mechanism is
successful. Is there a way to force the program to not need t=
he
transport data?  Any thoughts on why this is crashing?

Finally, I canno=
t find in the help what is meant by the option -id
<identifier>. I am not u=
sing this option so perhaps that is my problem. 

As a test, I have been tr=
ying to convert the mechanisms given by
livermore as a test and have been u=
nsuccessful with them all. 
http://www-cms.llnl.gov/combustion/combustion2.=
html

If anyone has any advice, I would be most grateful. 

Brian-
